#summary Sternons astronomy tool set

= Introduction =

Sternons aims at being a loose tool set for astronomy, such as scripts and programs interfacing each other according to the [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unix_philosophy Unix philosophy]. Sternons is decidedly jealous on [http://pp3.sourceforge.net/ PP3] for it's professionality and nice and beautiful documentation. However PP3 has some very !unUnician dependencies: it requires !LaTeX and ghostscript. Also it generates PDF or !PostScript, not an easy data format, such as SVG. Sternons aims at being composed of *very* losely knit tools, more like a Swiss army knife for generating this-or-that astronomy database, connection, interface, image or whatever.
